actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for contributions by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to local fire protection agencies for purposes of insuring adequate fire protection for Veterans' Administration medical facilities.

summary.text: Provides for contributions, not to exceed two-thirds of the salaries involved, by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to local fire protection agencies for purposes of supplementing salaries, in order to facilitate adequate fire protection for Veterans' Administration medical facilities. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 5001 (g))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for contributions by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to local fire protection agencies for purposes of insuring adequate fire protection for Veterans' Administration medical facilities.
